assumptions: Camera can detect white_plate or ScanForTarget will succeed within attempts

Gripper hardware available for Pick and Retreat actions
coherence_with_global: Implements the verify-phase around ApproachAndAlign from the global plan: re-check perception, align to white_plate with specified tolerance and timeout, compute a top grasp, attempt Pick with retries, confirm IsGraspStable, then retreatâ€”consistent with the GLOBAL_BT stepwise plan and success/failure handling.
